Package controllers

Class CreateCustomerController

java.lang.Object
controllers.AbstractController
controllers.CreateCustomerController
public class CreateCustomerController extends AbstractController
The CreateCustomerController class is a controller class for the "Create Customer" feature in a JavaFX application. It handles the creation of a new customer in the database by validating user input and sending appropriate database queries. It also displays error messages to the user if necessary.

  • Method Details

    • getUser

      public void getUser()
      Gets the user information for the given username. Displays an error message if the user is not found or is not a new user.

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Resets the form fields and enables the "Create" button.

    • customerCreate

      void customerCreate(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the creation of a new customer. Validates input and adds the customer to the database.
      Parameters:
      event - The ActionEvent that triggered this method.
